content.text: The official Node.js website has installation instructions for Node.js: https://nodejs.org
content.html: The official Node.js website has installation instructions for Node.js: https://nodejs.org

content.text: Once you have downloaded and installed Node.js on your computer, let's try to display "Hello World" in a web browser.
content.html: Once you have downloaded and installed Node.js on your computer, let's try to display "Hello World" in a web browser.

content.text: Create a Node.js file named "myfirst.js", and add the following code:
content.html: Create a Node.js file named "myfirst.js", and add the following code:

syntaxHighlighting.text:
var http = require('http');http.createServer(function (req, res) {  res.writeHead(200, {'Content-Type': 'text/html'});
    
  res.end('Hello World!');}).listen(8080);

content.text: Save the file on your computer: C:\Users\ Your Name \myfirst.js
content.html: Save the file on your computer: C:\Users\Your Name\myfirst.js

content.text: The code tells the computer to write "Hello World!" if anyone (e.g. a web browser) tries to access your computer on port 8080.
content.html: The code tells the computer to write "Hello World!" if anyone (e.g. a web browser) tries to access your computer on port 8080.

content.text: For now, you do not have to understand the code. It will be explained later.
content.html: For now, you do not have to understand the code. It will be explained later.

content.text: Node.js files must be initiated in the "Command Line Interface" program of your computer.
content.html: Node.js files must be initiated in the "Command Line Interface" program of your computer.

content.text: How to open the command line interface on your computer depends on the operating system. For Windows users, press the start button and look for "Command Prompt", or simply write "cmd" in the search field.
content.html: How to open the command line interface on your computer depends on the operating system. For Windows users, press the start button and look for "Command Prompt", or simply write "cmd" in the search field.

content.text: Navigate to the folder that contains the file "myfirst.js", the command line interface window should look something like this:
content.html: Navigate to the folder that contains the file "myfirst.js", the command line interface window should look something like this:

content.text: The file you have just created must be initiated by Node.js before any action can take place.
content.html: The file you have just created must be initiated by Node.js before any action can take place.

content.text: Start your command line interface, write node myfirst.js and hit enter:
content.html: Start your command line interface, write node myfirst.js and hit enter:

content.code_html: C:\Users\Your Name>node myfirst.js

content.text: Now, your computer works as a server!
content.html: Now, your computer works as a server!

content.text: If anyone tries to access your computer on port 8080, they will get a "Hello World!" message in return!
content.html: If anyone tries to access your computer on port 8080, they will get a "Hello World!" message in return!

content.text: Start your internet browser, and type in the address: http://localhost:8080
content.html: Start your internet browser, and type in the address: http://localhost:8080
